info.description: This is API documentation for the Labelprint System API. The API provides endpoints for adjusting label data and publishing news. The API requires authentication using a Bearer token. The API is hosted at `dev.wacoa.jp`.
info.title: Labelprint System API

get.description:
This endpoint receives a GET request with a user ID as a query parameter,
verifies the authentication token, and fetches the adjustment data
associated with the user ID from `adjust_service`.

Query Parameters:
- user_id (str): The ID of the user for whom adjustment data is requested.

Headers:
- Authorization (str): Bearer token to authenticate the user.

Returns:

- 200 OK: JSON response with the adjustment data if retrieval is successful.
- 401 Unauthorized: JSON error message if the authorization token is
missing or invalid.
- 500 Internal Server Error: JSON error message with details if an
unexpected error occurs.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The ID of the user for whom adjustment data is requested(e.g., "lbl_001").
parameters.name: user_id

401.description: Unauthorized – Missing or invalid authorization token.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

get.summary: Retrieves adjustment label data for a specified user.

post.description:
This endpoint receives a POST request with adjustment data and saves it
using `adjust_service.store_adjust_details` after verifying the
authorization token.

Headers:
- Authorization (str): Bearer token to authenticate the user.

Returns:

- 200 OK: JSON response with stored data if the operation is successful.
- 401 Unauthorized: JSON error message if the authorization token
is missing or invalid.
- 500 Internal Server Error: JSON error message with details if an
unexpected error occurs.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the adjustment data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – Missing or invalid authorization token.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

post.summary: Stores adjustment label data in the database.

get.description:
It retrieves the JSON data from the request, which should
contain a one-time reset URL, and calls the
`user_reset_password_mail` method to process the password reset
functionality.

parameters.description: The one-time reset URL identifier for initiating the password reset process.
parameters.name: url_id

400.description: Bad Request – If the reset URL is invalid or malformed.

404.description: Not Found – If the reset URL does not correspond to any user.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during the password reset process.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while sending the password reset email.

get.summary: Endpoint for sending a password reset email.

post.description:
Request Body:
JSON: The data containing the group ID to be deleted.

Returns:
JSON: A JSON response indicating the result of the delete operation.
- On success: 200 OK with a confirmation message.
- On missing: 404 if Group id not found
- On failure: 401 Unauthorized if the token is missing or invalid,
or 500 Internal Server Error for other issues.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the adjustment data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Not Found – If the group with the given ID does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

post.summary: Mark a group as deleted by updating its delete date.

get.description:
Query Parameters:
- group_id: The ID of the group to be edited.

Returns:
JSON: A JSON response containing the group data for editing and HTTP status code.
- On success: 200 OK with the group data.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The ID of the group to be edited.
parameters.name: group_id

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Not Found – If the group with the given ID does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Retrieve a group's information for editing.

get.description:
Returns:
JSON: A JSON response containing the list of groups and HTTP status code.
- On success: 200 OK with group data.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of non-deleted groups.

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during the process.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the group data.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all groups that are not marked as deleted.

get.description:
Query Parameters:
- group_name: (optional) Filter groups by this name.
- group_name_sub: (optional) Filter groups by this substring in their name.
- page: (optional) Specify the page number for pagination.

Returns:
JSON: A JSON response containing the filtered list of groups and HTTP status code.
- On success: 200 OK with group data.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: Filter groups by exact name(e.g., "Group Name").
parameters.name: group_name

parameters.description: Filter groups by a substring in their name(e.g., "Group ").
parameters.name: group_name_sub

parameters.description: The page number for pagination(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Field to sort the results by(e.g., "group_name ").
parameters.name: sort_field

parameters.description: The order of sorting (asc/desc).
parameters.name: sort_order

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of groups.

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of groups with optional filtering.

post.description:
Request Body:
JSON: The data of the group to be stored.

Returns:
JSON: A JSON response indicating the result of the store operation.
- On success: 200 Created with the created group data.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the adjustment data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

post.summary: Store a new group in the Firestore database.

post.description:
Request Body:
JSON: The updated data for the group.

Returns:
JSON: A JSON response indicating the result of the update operation.
- On success: 200 OK with the updated group data.
- On failure: 401 Unauthorized if the token is missing or invalid,
or 500 Internal Server Error for other issues.

parameters.description: Bearer token to authenticate the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the adjustment data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

404.description: Not Found – If the group with the given ID does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.description:
The route requires an authorization token and fetches label data based on parameters such as:
- label status
- start and end date
- office name
- receive type
- pagination (page number)

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The status of the label to filter by(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: label_status

parameters.description: Start date for filtering the labels(e.g., "2021-01-01").
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: End date for filtering the labels(e.g., "2021-01-01").
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: The name of the office to filter by(e.g., "Tokyo Office").
parameters.name: office_name

parameters.description: Type of receive to filter the labels(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: receive_type

parameters.description: Page number for pagination(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: page

200.description: List of labels with pagination info.

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Fetches a list of labels based on the provided filter parameters.

get.description: Similar to the `/api/label/label_list` route but includes the `union_id` filter.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: Union ID to filter labels by(e.g., "union_001").
parameters.name: union_id

parameters.description: The status of the label to filter by(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: label_status

parameters.description: Start date for filtering the labels(e.g., "2021-01-01").
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: End date for filtering the labels(e.g., "2021-12-31").
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: The name of the office to filter by(e.g., "Tokyo Office").
parameters.name: office_name

parameters.description: Type of receive to filter the labels(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: receive_type

parameters.description: Page number for pagination(e.g., 1).
parameters.name: page

200.description: List of labels with pagination info.

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Fetches a list of labels for a specific union, based on the provided filter parameters.

get.description: This route fetches label printing details based on the provided `label_type` and `printIds` parameters.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The type of label to filter by(e.g., "1").
parameters.name: label_type

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of print IDs(e.g., "1102").
parameters.name: printIds

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Fetches a list of label print details for the specified label type and print IDs.

get.description:
The route returns a summary report based on the following parameters:
- keyword
- shimebi (deadline)
- start and end months
- shukei_type (type of summary)
- group ID
- union ID

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The keyword to filter the summary by.
parameters.name: keyword

parameters.description: Deadline to filter by(e.g., 31).
parameters.name: shimebi

parameters.description: The start month for the summary period(e.g., "2019-12").
parameters.name: start_month

parameters.description: The end month for the summary period(e.g., "2019-12").
parameters.name: end_month

parameters.description: The type of summary(e.g.,1).
parameters.name: shukei_type

parameters.description: The group ID to filter by.
parameters.name: group_id

parameters.description: The union ID to filter by.
parameters.name: union_id

output_name.example: 日本室内装飾事業協同組合

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Fetches a summary of labels based on various filters such as keyword, dates, and group/union ID.

post.description: This route accepts a POST request with JSON data for updating label print information.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the adjustment data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

post.summary: Updates the label printing data based on the provided request payload.

post.description:
This route accepts a JSON object containing user credentials and returns a token
along with the user record if the authentication is successful.

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the login data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – Invalid credentials.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

post.summary: Authenticates a user and logs them in.

post.description:
This endpoint handles the POST request for user logout. It retrieves the user's authentication
token from the request headers, verifies the token, and calls the `user_logout` method to
remove the token from the user's record in Firestore.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the user information for logout.
parameters.name: body

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during logout.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred during logout.

post.summary: Logs out a user by removing their authentication token from the server.

post.description:
This endpoint handles the password reset process by accepting a JSON payload
containing user identification and new password information. It processes the
request and returns an appropriate response indicating the outcome of the
password reset attempt.

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing user ID and new password information.
parameters.name: body

400.description: Bad Request – If the passwords do not match or other validation fails.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during password reset.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred during the password reset process.

post.summary: Reset the password for a user.

post.description:
This endpoint handles the password reset process by accepting a JSON payload
containing user identification and new password information. It processes the
request and returns an appropriate response indicating the outcome of the
password reset attempt.

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing user ID and new password information.
parameters.name: body

400.description: Bad Request – If the provided data is invalid, such as mismatched passwords or missing fields.

error.example: Password and confirmation do not match.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during the password reset process.

details.example: Internal server error during password reset.

error.example: An unexpected error occurred while resetting the password.

post.summary: Reset the password for a user.

post.description:
This endpoint allows a logged-in user to update their password. It verifies the
user's authorization token, processes the password update request, and returns
the appropriate response based on the success or failure of the operation.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authenticating the user.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the new password data.
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized – Invalid authorization token.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while updating the password.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the necessary information for creating and publishing news.

200.description: A JSON object containing the data required for publishing news.

example.body: This is the body of the news article.
example.title: Sample Title

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during processing.

get.summary: Fetch data required for publishing news.

post.description:
This route handles POST requests containing a login ID. It retrieves the login ID from the request data,
invokes the `user_reset_password_link` method to generate and send a password reset link to the user's email,
and returns the appropriate response to the client.

parameters.description: The JSON payload containing the login ID for password reset.
parameters.name: body

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during password reset.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while sending the reset link.

post.summary: Endpoint to initiate a password reset process by sending a reset link to the user's email.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The start date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format to filter 'shinsei' requests.
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: The end date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format to filter 'shinsei' requests.
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: The office name to filter 'shinsei' requests based on the user's office.
parameters.name: office_name

parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1 if not provided.
parameters.name: page

401.description: Unauthorized – Missing or invalid authorization token.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

get.summary: Endpoint to retrieve a paginated list of 'shinsei' requests with optional filtering by date range and office name.

get.description:
Args:
login_id (str): The login ID of the user (optional).
user_name (str): The name of the user (optional).
email (str): The email address of the user (optional).
user_type (str): The type of user (optional).
tokuyu_flg (str): The flag for tokuyu (optional).
user_system_no (str): The system number of the user (optional).
union_id (str): The ID of the union to which the user belongs (optional).
group_id (str): The ID of the group to which the user belongs (optional).
page (int): The page number for pagination (optional).

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: Filter by the login ID of the user(e.g., "12345").
parameters.name: login_id

parameters.description: Filter by the name of the user(e.g., "John Doe").
parameters.name: user_name

parameters.description: Filter by the user's email address(e.g., "user@mail.com").
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Filter by the user's type(1,2,3,4).
parameters.name: user_type

parameters.description: Pagination - page number(e.g.,1").
parameters.name: page

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

parameters.description: Bearer token for authorization.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: Filter users by the union ID they belong to(e.g., "12345").
parameters.name: union_id

parameters.description: Filter by the login ID of the user (optional)(e.g., "12345").
parameters.name: login_id

parameters.description: Filter by the name of the user (optional)(e.g., "John Doe").
parameters.name: user_name

parameters.description: Filter by the user's email address (optional)(e.g., "user@mail.com").
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Filter by the user's type (optional)(1,2,3,4).
parameters.name: user_type

parameters.description: Pagination - page number (optional).
parameters.name: page

401.description: Unauthorized – If the token is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected error during processing.

get.summary: Fetch a list of users filtered by union ID.
